title: Researching North Korea online? You could be victim of a malware attack
description: A backdoor is being installed on pro-North Korean websites, targeting people from specific countries in Japan and China.

title: Biden and Republicans want companies to be held responsible for web moderation
description: President Biden is questioning web companies’ immunity following a court case that could lead to reforms.

title: IBM has built a cost-effective AI supercomputer in its cloud
description: IBM has created an AI-specific supercomputer that’s optimized to delivery the best cost efficiency.

title: Hotmail's epic spam fail is the latest headache for Microsoft
description: Seeing more spam than usual? It’s not you – Hotmail is experiencing some junk filter bugs.

title: The OnePlus 11 Concept looks like more like a gaming PC than a phone
description: OnePlus has shared a handful of teaser images for the OnePlus 11 Concept phone.

title: GoDaddy suffered a data breach over three years
description: A threat actor was sitting for years in GoDaddy's systems, stealing source code and compromising customers.

title: Gran Turismo 7's new AI might be able to beat the game's best players
description: Sony AI and Polyphony Digital debut Sophy in Gran Turismo 7, a new neural network-trained artificial intelligence.

title: Linux Kernel 6.2 is here, and it now has mainline support for Apple M1 chips
description: Apple’s plan for hardware and software exclusivity is under attack by Linux and Windows.

title: RTX 4070 leak suggests that Nvidia has learned nothing from the RTX 4080 mess
description: Gigabyte has apparently leaked a trio of RTX 4070 GPUs from Nvidia, showing 10GB, 12GB, and 16GB models of the card.

title: The FBI might have suffered a cyberattack
description: The FBI said it was investigating a data breach within its own system, but maintains that it's an "isolated incident".

title: Pikmin 4 on Switch: release date, trailers, gameplay and more
description: Here's everything we know so far about Pikmin 4, Nintendo's upcoming real-time strategy game.

title: Samsung's Galaxy S23 phone series gets safeguards against zero-click malware attacks
description: Samsung introduces the Message Guard, a "virtual quarantine" for files received via Samsung Messages and Google Messages.

title: Microsoft is rushing ChatGPT Bing onto iPhones and Android – and that's a bad idea
description: Despite the gaffes, Microsoft is determined to bring ChatGPT-powered Bing to Android and iPhone.

title: Atlassian worker's credentials stolen to leak data
description: Investigation finds that someone posted employee credentials on a public repository by mistake.

title: Facebook and Instagram want you to start paying for social media success
description: Meta's new subscription service for verified Facebook and Instagram users feels more like a money grab than an improvement.

title: This first-party Xbox title is set to allow mouse and keyboard on console
description: Arkane’s co-op vampire hunting game, Redfall, let's you use a gamepad or mouse and keyboard to take down bloodsuckers.

title: Microsoft calls for calm after Windows 11 driver update panic
description: Don’t worry about driver update failure bug, Microsoft advises – your PC is just fine.

title: The latest Steam Deck update makes it easier to download your favorite PC games
description: The new Steam Deck update lets you transfer Steam games from your PC to your Steam Deck over your local network.

title: The Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra may have an annoying camera stabilization problem
description: Reports have emerged concerning a potential camera stabilization bug on the Galaxy S23 Ultra.

title: New Indiana Jones game: everything we know so far
description: Bethesda and MachineGames are working on a new Indiana Jones game. Here's everything we know so far.

title: Where to watch every 2023 BAFTA movie winner: All Quiet on the Western Front and more
description: Want to know where you can stream the movies that were this year's BAFTA winners? We've got you covered.

title: EU lawmakers argue against signing US data-transfer pact
description: Sharing personal data between the EU and the US is set to get easier, but not without a hitch first!

title: Windows 11’s revamp of File Explorer spotted with a surprising hidden feature
description: It seems Microsoft is planning a built-in photo gallery, though it’s not officially in testing – yet.

title: Presidents' Day sales live blog: today's best deals
description: Presidents' Day sales 2023 have officially started - and we're tracking down the best deals for you right now.
